title: Details
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The details element represents a disclosure widget from which the user can obtain additional information or controls.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: A basic example of using a details element
usageExamples.code:
<details>
   <summary>Click to reveal more details</summary>
   More details here
</details>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Using the 'open' attribute to show content by default
usageExamples.code:
<details open>
   <summary>Click to reveal more details</summary>
   More details here
</details>
